Title: McClanahan, Zunino begin team workouts with Tampa Bay Rays
Description: After a World Series run to end 2020, the Tampa Bays Rays held their first team workout today and that included a pair of Southwest Florida natives, Shane McClanahan and Mike Zunino. It seems like only yesterday that Mariner alum Mike Zunino hit four home runs in the postseason and Cape Coral Alum Shane McClanahan got his first career start during the American League Divisional Series in Yankee Stadium.
Author: NBC2
